column1: ’m so deeply grateful to Hawai’i voters for entrusting me with representing you in Congress for another two years. It is a heavy responsibility in a critical time for our country and home and I pledge to continue to do my very best for all of us. Mahalo! https://t.co/PMQavM4FIq
